Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Get the lowdown on what people are buzzing about on social media Down Under. The budget deficit appears to be decreasing while personal income tax and company tax are up. However, concerns are being raised by the public over the Australian government's approach to managing finances. While GrainGrowers are calling for funding to repair damaged rural roads, others are demanding answers about how the government will tackle the accumulating $1 trillion debt. Amidst all this, a post is calling for Australia to receive a direct and fair share of profits from its limited national resources.
